tr.td: When called on a database, these functions are similar to xHarbour db*All, except that this only closes tables/cursors on this database, not all tables/cursors. If we can eliminate these functions by making them happen automatically, so much the better.

This should probably be .flush, but not sure until we implement transactions. If it's commit, then we should be reviewing PostgreSQL transaction stuff here too.
